answers.c: It enhances flood resistance by controlling ethylene pathways

questions.question: 4. What is the binary vector strategy in Agrobacterium-mediated gene transfer?

answers.a: Using viral vectors to insert genes into plants
answers.b: Removing tumor-inducing genes while retaining virulence genes
answers.c: Transferring genes directly into plant embryos without vectors
answers.d: Inserting RNA sequences instead of DNA

answers.a: A gene that is expressed only under specific conditions

answers.c: A gene that is repressed by external factors
